# iosxr_hw_module_shutdown (Resource)

This resource can manage the HW Module Shutdown configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_hw_module_shutdown" "example" {
  location_name = "0/0/CPU0"
  unshut        = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `location_name` (String) Specify the location

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `shut` (Boolean) shutdown the hw-module
- `unshut` (Boolean) Unshut the hw-module

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_hw_module_shutdown.example "<location_name>"
```
